item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, July 24, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Harris vs Trump: America’s sudden gender election
2. From kingmaker to spectator: Murdoch consigned to the Republican sidelines
3. US markets suffer worst day since 2022 as Tesla and AI stocks fall
4. Harris bets on surge of voter enthusiasm as she eyes path to US election victory
5. LVMH leads sell-off in global luxury shares as downturn fears deepen
